about.title: About Me
about.description: Your about content will go here. Describe your experience, skills, and what makes you unique as a senior front-end engineer.

canalplus.title: CanalPlus
canalplus.description: Within the Interfaces and Experiences Department of Canal+, I work on the front-end development of OTT products.

canalplusTv.title: CanalPlus on TV
canalplusTv.description: Adaptation and deployment of myCanal's Reactjs webapp on new devices : Playstation5, Samsung TV, LG TV and Hisense TV using the proprietary frameworks and SDKs.

shadow.title: Shadow
shadow.description: Within the Core Business Plateform, I worked on the front-end development of Shadow products.

stonal.title: Stonal
stonal.description: Across the front-end teams, I worked on the front-end development of Stonal products. I analyzed, designed, and developed innovative features.

description.connect: Interested in working together? Let's connect!
